description:
The benefits of Holistic Natural remedies and Natural medicine is that they are gentle, non-toxic and safe. They improve the general health of the patient.

Learn how to use Natural remedies and Holistic medicine for your entire family, cats, dogs, animals and people.

You want to do your best for your family- animal and people but you might be getting conflicting advice about which medications/drugs are safe and which Natural products work effectively.

I am a Holistic/Natural Veterinarian whose passion is to keep animals (and humans) healthy using natural remedies, natural medicine and holistic medicine, including Homeopathic remedies, herbs and Natural supplements.

I am here to teach you how to use Natural remedies for many of your pet’s (and your) common problems and help you avoid the toxic side effects of conventional drugs/medications.

I have over a decade of experience treating animals for all types of health issues including cancer and chronic disease. I use Natural herbs and homeopathy for my patients and also for my own family, pets and people. This keeps my family and patients healthy and avoids the side effects of drugs/medications. Learn from me how to keep your own family healthy using natural medicine and natural remedies. (As an added bonus, many can be used for yourself and your (human) children too!)

I have given countless seminars on using Natural remedies and homeopathy. My seminars have been taken by people from all walks of life, who want to keep their pets healthy and avoid the side effects of drugs/medications. My students tell the seminars have given them the confidence to use Natural remedies and homeopathy for their pets and themselves. Now you can learn how to use Natural remedies and homeopathy from me on-line without having to come to my seminars.

I am one of a few Veterinarians in North America who is also certified as a Classical Homeopath with the CHC, Council for Homeopathic Certification, which means I am trained to treat people as well as animals. This extra knowledge allows me to teach you how to use Natural remedies even better.

Learn how to use these non-toxic, safe and gentle natural remedies for your own family, whether pets or humans.

Learn how to keep your pets and family healthy by using Natural medicine and Natural remedies. No prior experience is needed, I will teach you what you need to know in this course. You will begin to learn how to use this valuable method of healing. using natural remedies and natural medicine, for your own family (animal or human) and feel confident in doing the best for your family. Then you can avoid many toxic drugs and medications.
